name: Help Me? Help You!
description:
This game requires a keyboard and mouse as well as a controller to play. Keyboard and mouse player will control Player 1 (Left screen) and the controller player will control Player 2 (Right screen).

Help Me? Help You! is a co-op puzzle game inspired by Gang Beasts, Human Falls Flat and The Witness. Players must work together and communicate with their partner to overcome challenges in each level and meet each other at the end with an ever-present split-screen to help them solve puzzles.

When the two players meet in the middle, the level ends and they can progress onto the next one.
